name: Writer's Sidebar
description: A little "writer's sidebar". This person (you) writes stories, edits your stories and schedule your activity. I recommend it for personal blogs and not kfashion, pastel or kawaii blogs. I hope you enjoy this writer's sidebar! PS: If you want me to change anything, sure! Message me at my Tumblr or through private messaging at usertsyles.org!
additional_info:
Posts - Published
Followers - Clients
Queued - Timetable
Drafts - [ Drafts ]
Activity - Schedule
Likes - Stories
Customize - Edit Story
Following - Famous Authors
Spotlight - Top Stories
